timeline.message: clean up some variable names and commented out code

timeline.bodyText: Would it be more flexible to pass in the Patient and Practitioner UUIDs so they don't have to be parsed out of the reference strings?
timeline.author: em1

timeline.message: renamed patientReference to patientMBIHash to reflect the actual thing being passed in, lookback no longer ignores operation outcome
retrieve providerID from roster, because job provides rosterID not providerID and update tests
handle when the group resource passes in a rosterID and when the data service passes in a providerID to be able to find the roster when processing a job

timeline.bodyText: Method ambiguousIDPredicates has 5 arguments (exceeds 4 allowed). Consider refactoring.
timeline.author: codeclimate

timeline.message: trying to make code climate happy

timeline.bodyText: Method bufferAndWrite has 5 arguments (exceeds 4 allowed). Consider refactoring.
timeline.author: codeclimate

timeline.bodyText: If we know for sure the ID is a rosterID, do we need to go to the trouble of using an ambiguousID parameter to getProviderIDFromRoster()?  Why not call it rosterID?
timeline.author: dhgreene

timeline.message: rename variable and method to be clearer on what IDs it's operating on
add mechanism to skip look back
look back should not be limited by since date
disable lookback for prod-sbx, test, dev
move test to appropriate package and rename test
Merge branch 'DPC-25-Lookback-alternative' of https://github.com/CMSgov/dpc-app into DPC-25-Lookback-alternative
